data.description:
Soar across the beautiful skies of the San Francisco bay area, Las Vegas, and Switzerland, in Flight Unlimited.  Fly in over 12 aircraft in Free Flight Mode, and perform various missions in this one of a kind Flight experience. 

The campaign tasks with you missions such as rescuing a prisoner from Alcatraz, B2 Bomber surveillance over the Swiss Alps, landing your Cessna on the Golden Gate Bridge, and more!

Aircraft:

A-10 Thunderbolt
Cessna 172
Pitts Special
Challenger Learjet
Douglas DC3
Curtis P40E
Robin DR400
F/A-18 Hornet
B2 Spirit
C130 Hercules
E2C Hawkeye
Ultralight (IAP for free flight mode)
F-22 Raptor (IAP for free flight mode)
Boeing 747 (IAP for free flight mode)

Features:
- Extensive Free Flight mode in 4 locations
- Satellite Imagery covering over 500 SQ Miles.
- Realistic 3D Cockpits
- Campaign mode with GTA style missions
- Landmarks such as Alcatraz, the Golden Gate Bridge, AT&T Park, Oracle Arena, and more
- Over 12 aircraft
